'''"Maintenance Mek" Salvaged Parts''' is a [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material]] item that will transform into some of the following items once acquired:
{{Card|Meshing Gear|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mechanical Spur Gear|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Artificed Dynamic Gear|show_caption=1}}

==How to Obtain==
"Maintenance Mek" Salvaged Parts can only be obtained by converting.
